    • animalDataBaseRead

      public void animalDataBaseRead(ArrayList<Animal> animals)

      Parameters:
      animals - FarmApp.Animal list

    • employeeDatabaseRead

      public void employeeDatabaseRead(ArrayList<Employee> employees)

      Parameters:
      employees - FarmApp.Employee list

    • insertValuesAnimal

      public void insertValuesAnimal(Animal animal)
      first connects to the database. After making the correct changes, adds to the Animal table in the database.
      Parameters:
      animal - current animal that will be added

    • deleteAnimal

      public void deleteAnimal(int tagNo)
      first connects to the database. deletes from the database where the given tag number equals to same tag number in the database (Animal table).
      Parameters:
      tagNo - tag number of the animal that want to delete

    • insertValuesEmployee

      public void insertValuesEmployee(Employee employee)
      first connects to the database. After making the correct changes, adds to the Employee table in the database.
      Parameters:
      employee - current employee that will be added
